message: http://isdjango1.3releasedyet.com/
(checks if http://code.djangoproject.com/svn/django/tags/releases/1.3 is non-404)
jajaja NO
surely you could have got a better domain and make it work for any django 1.X subdomain :P
Release party at pycon sprint? :-)
@SmileyChris releasedyet.com IS available. :P
@philippbosch you should ask @paltman for the font he used, he got the django one for isalexacoredev or whatever it was called
plus each third security release! What forwards thinking :D
@SmileyChris That domain is ready for Django 2.3, 3.3, ... ;)
"We're almost there!" http://www.djangoproject.com/weblog/2011/mar/03/13-rc/
Test the hell out of this rc!!

@jezdez Since you asked so nicely ;) I upgraded a non-trivial project at work and found one area which broke, which was a custom admin filterspec and therefore solidly in the category of "you monkey-patched it, you fix it". Looking like a nice release and I'm really looking forward to the upgrade
@acdha Awesome, glad to hear that, and yeah, I had to deal with that kind of monkey situation myself. Can't wait to have this release out :)
Maybe someone could enlighten me, what's the holdup for 1.3 at this point? Last I heard it was to be released at PyCon US, but I guess that plan fell through for some reason?
I don't mean to be impatient or ungrateful btw; just wondering status
@craigds I heard @jezdez was still getting the last of the translations finalized, but the best way to check would be to look at the bug tracker.

Yep, I had a look at the bug tracker, but it seems there's approximately a gazillion things left? Surely that can't be right: http://code.djangoproject.com/query?status=assigned&status=new&status=reopened&stage=Accepted&stage=Ready+for+checkin&milestone=1.3&col=id&col=summary&col=status&col=owner&col=component&col=version&order=priority
Anyone have some idea of when?
It's out now! Yay!
pop champagne!!!!!!!!!
YEAAAH!!
DJANGO 1.3 IS RELEASED TODAY! @philippbosch
Congrats all involved. Lots of stuff on here to have a closer look at http://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/releases/1.3/#what-s-new-in-django-1-3
